techniqueDifficultyExplanation: The technique difficulty is rated as Beginner due to the simple, straightforward nature of stretching exercises. The video is titled as an everyday, full body stretch and is meant to be accessible for all levels, as indicated by the description which suggests doing it at various times of the day.
effortDifficultyExplanation: The effort difficulty is Light, given the short duration of the workout (less than 7 minutes) and its purpose as a stretch routine, which is generally not physically demanding. Comments also support this with mentions of modification and ease of the routine.
requiredFitnessLevelExplanation: The required fitness level is primarily Beginner due to the accessibility and low effort required. Intermediate is also included with a lower score as even those with some fitness experience can benefit from regular stretching. Comments indicate that some users found it slightly challenging, hence the inclusion of Intermediate in the scoring.
